name: CORGY
description:
This game was made in the context of the NSFW Variety Jam. I tried approaching the theme on an absurdist level while trying to not stray to far from it at the same time.

Future Improvements:
  • A timer
  • Scrollable Map
  • Arcade-like Stages with goals
  • Adding different Dogs
  • Adding textures to maps
  • Hopefully better music
